inventory.commentary: 12jan07 updated to WN 2.1, added features. ahouston 12jan07 changed definitions, added examples and argument frames. ahouston

sense.name: causing greater complexity
sense.commentary: COMPLICATION[+event][+action][+creation][+complexity] Note: a nominalization: his complication of the explanation -> he complicated the explanation Note: implies X complicated Y, where X is a cause/agent of increasing complexity of patient/object Y
sense.examples: His unnecessary complication of the explanation only confused the students. I tried to reduce the lawyer's complication of the wording of the letter. The new experimental data's complication of the existing theory cannot be dismissed.

sense.name: a situation that is an instance of increased complexity
sense.commentary: COMPLICATION[+state][+situation][+complexity][+increased] Note: occurs as 'X BE complication' where X is a situation, event, -not- an entity (Sense 4)
sense.examples: Your arrival at my wedding is certainly a complication, John. The King's decision had many unforeseen complications. (decision = action, situation) My plan didn't go smoothly-- there were a few complications along the way.

sense.name: secondary medical problem
sense.commentary: COMPLICATION[+event][+physiological][+medical][+condition][+adverse] Note: implies structures of the form 'X happened', 'X is the case' where X is an adverse medical condition. Note: a narrow, specific usage of Sense 2 - Sense 3 always implies a medical event. A disease or disorder that results from another disease or disorder (or from a treatment).
sense.examples: He died of complications from the surgery. Were there complications from the gunshot wound? Bed sores are a common complication of long-term paralysis.

sense.name: the attribute or quality of complexity of something
sense.commentary: COMPLICATION[+quality][+intricacy] Note: implies 'X HAS complication', where complication is an attribute of X and X is an entity
sense.examples: I like organization and neatness, and I really hate complication in a filing system. The puzzle's level of complication makes it very difficult to solve. You must read his books carefully because of the complications in the plot structures.
